comment.text: This translation key is used for a label that indicates a link to view a form when it's available only for viewing. It appears in a UI element, likely as part of a button or dialog, and is associated with the "CompletedForm:LinkToViewOnlyForm" content string.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Yalnız forma baxmaq üçün link:" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Link to view-only form:". A more accurate and natural rendering would be something like "Baxmaq üçün olan formanın linki:". The current translation feels a bit clunky and word-for-word.

The translation "Линк за формуляр само за преглед:" is a literal translation but not the most natural way to express 'Link to view-only form:' in Bulgarian. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Връзка към формуляр само за преглед:' or 'Линк към формуляр за преглед само:'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Връзка към формуляр само за преглед:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the translation 'Odkaz na formulář určený pouze k prohlížení:' is a bit verbose and formal for a user-facing label. A more natural and concise translation would be preferable.
The translation 'Ձևաթղթի դիտման հղում՝ միայն կարդալու ռեժիմում' is a bit literal and verbose. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Armenian. 'ռեժիմում' (in mode) is awkward here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձևի դիտման հղում կամ Դիտման հղում ձևի համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '՝' is grammatically correct but may create visual clutter. A simpler structure would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the '՝' and restructure the sentence for better flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຄະນະໂອກາດເພື່ອເບິ່ງແບບຟອມແບບນຶ່ງຢ່າງເທົ່ານັ້ນ:' is not an accurate translation of 'Link to view-only form:'. The phrase 'ຄະນະໂອກາດ' (kano okat) which translates to 'opportunity' or 'chance' doesn't fit the context of a link. A more appropriate translation would emphasize the 'link' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be something like 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ໄປເບິ່ງແບບຟອມແບບນຶ່ງຢ່າງເທົ່ານັ້ນ:' (Sueam to pai beng bap form bap neung yang thao nan:) which translates to 'Link to view-only form:' or 'ລິ້ງໄປເບິ່ງແບບຟອມແບບນຶ່ງຢ່າງເທົ່ານັ້ນ:' (Ling pai beng bap form bap neung yang thao nan:) which directly uses the word 'link'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a colon at the end. While not strictly incorrect, it's unusual in this context and might be better without it.

The translation 'Link-ul către formular numai cu vizualizare:' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "Link to view-only form:". 'Numai cu vizualizare' is a literal translation of 'view-only' and sounds awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would include 'doar vizualizare' or 'pentru vizualizare doar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link-ul către formular pentru vizualizare doar:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "formular" is inconsistent with the English source. While colons are sometimes used, they are less common in this context in Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link-ul către formular pentru vizualizare doar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'බැලීම-පමණි පෝරමය වෙත සබැඳිය:' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Link to a form that can only be viewed'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Possible suggestions include: 'බැලීමට පමණක් හැකි පෝරමය සඳහා සබැඳිය:' or 'පමණක් බැලීමට හැකි පෝරමයක සබැඳිය:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphenated word 'පෝරමය-පමණි' can be slightly jarring. While acceptable, it's more common to see a space or a different construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to use a space or more natural phrasing to avoid the hyphenated word.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Odkaz na prehľad formulára:' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Link to view-only form:'. 'Prehľad' translates to 'overview' or 'summary', while 'view-only form' implies a specific link to access a form with restricted modification capabilities. A more accurate translation would emphasize the access restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odkaz na formulár na zobrazenie (iba čítanie):

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Link za obrazac samo za pregled" is a bit literal and could be more naturally phrased in Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would emphasize the 'view-only' aspect.

The Turkish translation 'Salt görüntülenebilir form bağlantısı:' is not the best equivalent for 'Link to view-only form:'. 'Salt' translates to 'salt' which doesn't fit the context. It should convey the idea of 'view' or 'access'.
